name: Glasmar
description:
Glasmar is an Impressive Title server that began development in November 2017 and recently reopened early 2019. We strive to keep all the original and fun aspects of Impressive Title while also keep it fresh with new additions or tweaks.

We have over 150 individual maps, over 1000 items, and all sorts of new markings that you can enjoy! There is a no shortage of content in Glasmar, with updates coming every season! 

We have a tight-knit community with 400+ players that come from all parts of the world. Join our growing family today!
